sentences.sContent: THE discomposure of spirits which this extraordinary visit threw Elizabeth into, could not be easily overcome; nor could she, for many hours, learn to think of it less than incessantly.
sentences.sContent_eng: THE discomposure of spirits which this extraordinary visit threw Elizabeth into, could not be easily overcome; nor could she, for many hours, learn to think of it less than incessantly.
sentences.sCn: 这不速之客去了以后，伊丽莎白很是心神不安，而且很不容易恢复宁静。 她接连好几个钟头不断地思索着这件事。

trans.tranCn: 心乱, 狼狈, 不安
